para: There are a billion variants of Comma Separated Value data. This is the one specifically that makes DeLorme S&A Deluxe 9 happy. It's also a very simple program and useful for many other programs like spreadsheets, but contains only a very minimal information. For general purpose use, you'll probably be more happy with our universal csv (unicsv) format.
CSV is also the correct format for Lowrance MapCreate, their commercial mapping program, or GDM6 (their free waypoint manager) for iFinder which is available at lowrance.com
On write, this format writes simple "latitude, longitude" pairs, but on read it will read anything supported by our human readable definition.
For something-separated data that has headers identifying the various fields, see our universal csv format.

example.title: Example 'csv' file
example.programlisting: 35.97203, -87.13470, Mountain Bike Heaven by susy1313 36.09068, -86.67955, The Troll by a182pilot & Family 35.99627, -86.62012, Dive Bomber by JoGPS & family 36.03848, -86.64862, FOSTER by JoGPS & Family
